[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/v2/conflicting_txn_tracker.rs] [Overall design] [Round limit] If max_partitioning_rounds is exceeded, remaining transactions go to last round - can this bypass tracker-based conflict detection? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/v2/conflicting_txn_tracker.rs] [Overall design] [Tentative acceptance] Transactions move from tentatively_accepted to finally_accepted based on sender ordering - can tracker state diverge from this flow? (High)
